content.detailedDescription: In my backyard, viewed a white orb slowly moving over top of me. it was at high altitude. it was very different from a satellite in the sense that it pulsed light then simply vanished after 20 seconds of viewing it.  behind it were two distinct airplanes flying close together which i thought is unusual for commercial airliners. thanks for reading
content.summary: Bright white orb, very different from a star, or satellite. moved slowly then vanished

content.detailedDescription:
3 ufo's each of same size and speed and appearance.  the first two on the same sw trajectory about 1 minute apart, the third several minutes later more on a sww course.

objects were difficult to see.  distance is difficult to gauge.

objects each had a gently illuminated front edge and appears either boomerang shaped or perhaps disc / spherical.  no one wold of noticed this who was not already looking up.

i was in my back yard looking up, cooling off.

noticed the movement.

my best guess is that the objects were at least 1000m high, although they could of been much higher.  perfectly silent.

size of objects gave the perspective of 3x the size of the moon,  so it was likely quite large.

i was able to track the first 2 ufo's for a 40-50 degree swath.  the third for perhaps 15 -25 degrees. sight of the objects was lost due to distance / angle / difficulty.

objects each had similar and consistent speed of 2-4 x a jet plane.

objects struck me as unusual / extraordinary. nothing about the experiences necessarily suggests alien,  but the closest man made pattern match is a balloon.   but given the swift speed and the absence of wind (at ground level) this seems unlikely, besides there were 3.
content.summary: 3 ufo's moving swiftly, spherical or disc shaped with gently illuminated front edge

content.detailedDescription: Ok so me and my mom where driving one summer night, i cannot recall where we were heading that night maybe to the store or something, like we do on some nights. anyways we where at the intersection of woodridge dr and bellfort st getting ready to turn left on bellfort street, when all of a sudden i saw a bright light in the sky, at first i thought that it might be a plane or a helicopter with there searchlight on because there is an airport not far from the location i saw the ufo but helicopters and planes often have other lights flashing on its sides or tails like a red or blue or white lights flashing but not this, it was just there like a bright star in the sky then i thought this cant be a star its too bright and too close almost looked like it was about a mile in the dark sky where the clouds are plus the stars around here are never that bright or close like that. whatever it was it certainly wasnt a plane helicopter or star or tower of any sort im positive. i pointed out to my mom after i was positive it was a ufo, she also thought that it was a airplane or a helicopter but after i got done explaining to her that planes or helicopter also have other lights flashing she became convinced that it was a ufo. we lost sight of it because we kept driving, we shouldve pulled over and investigated further but we didnt:( the whole sighting lasted for like 15 seconds while we were driving past it, it wasnt following us or anything it was just posted there in the sky like it was supposed to be there like a very very bright star. still cant explain what was that that super bright light in the sky on that summer night but im glad i was able to witnnessed it and have and encounter of the first kind it was awesome:)
content.summary: Ufo was hovering in the sky with a very bright star light

content.detailedDescription: At about 5:45 pm on saturday november 7th, 2015 i was outside with my daughter bbqing. she looked up into the sky and told me she saw something in the sky. i looked up to where she was pointing and observed what i can only describe as a solid white spotlight shining into a cloud with a green light in it. i stood there staring at this bright light to see if it would move or if it were a helicopter but there were no other lights on it at all and the object did not move or flash. this light was shining into a cloud with a green light in the middle of the cloud. there were no other clouds in the sky. the light from the object with the bright light was bright a reflected off the cloud with the green light in it. the bright light then seemed to detach or move away backward from the cloud in a straight line and slowly. we watched the bright light move away for quite awhile while the cloud with the green light remained. i am sure you have gotten lots of call on this but what me and my daughter saw defined anything i've seen. it was not the triton missile after researching what a trident launch looks like on youtube. my phone was charging and i was to be honest to amazed as what i was seeing to even think about going to grab it. i was just more amazed at whst me and my daughter were observing. that all i could think was to call my mother and wife to see what i was seeing. my wife got pictures of it after the light began to slowly move away from the cloud. what i saw was no triton missile launch or any missile launch i have seen or researched after i saw what i saw. i would really appreciate and hope someone calls or visits me and my daughter so we can better explain what we saw because it was not natural.
content.summary: It was a stationary white light shining at a cloud with a green light in it.

content.detailedDescription:
1.  i was looking outside both the nights of november 8 and november 9, 2015 at approximately 7:00 to 7:30 p.M.

2.  i first noticed the object because of it's unusually bright light in that direction for any stars, then i observed it moving around a bit.

3.  not sure what it was at first -- maybe a helicopter or plane way in the distance, yet it's variable movement did not appear to be the typical maneuvers of those aircraft, yet there was no sound, either.  my other thought is that this could be a privately-owned drone.  however, to my knowledge, the battery packs don't last the duration that i observed it both nights. 

4.  the object over time followed the general stars in the night sky.  however, it would hover in the same direction i spotted it, then swerve to the left and right by a 1-3 degrees at most (if you were to compare it to the distance between celestial objects.) it would also go up and down slightly, but somewhat less than the left-to-right movement.  

5.  it just really made me wonder what it could be.  it could possibly be a simple private drone, although it appeared to be way above the 500-ft. limit the faa recently mandated.  secondly, why would someone be flying it at night?  trying to put myself in someone's shoes, maybe it was to capture footage of the taurid meteor shower?  i tried waiting around for a terminal drop in the object to corroborate a dead or draining battery power.  i did not observe this on either night.  other than that, i rather appreciate the notion that we do not know the answers to everything.

6.  simply put, i got cold and went inside.  i figured that if it's clear tonight (which it is), i'll see if it was out there again -- and it was!
content.summary: Light that mainly hovered, yet wobbled slightly left to right, up and down -- no set pattern. not sure if a drone.

content.detailedDescription:
traveling east om highway 30 between marshalltown and legrand with my wife. we saw one bright star on our left low to the horizon and no other stars. it appeared to be a red to orange color. looking to the right side of the highway, higher in the sky we both noticed three very bright stars and no other stars. there were two stars above one star. 
 two stars were next to each other and a third star was lined up exactly below the star on the left. total of three bright stars. all the stars were an equal distance apart from each other. we didn't see any other stars or lights in the sky.
 about ten to fifteen seconds later, the star on the bottom left started to rise straight up towards the star above it. it changed color from bright white to orange/red. before it reached the star above, it faded away and disappeared.
 about ten seconds later the other two stars went straight up together and changed color to orange/red. they faded away while they were moving exactly liked the bottom star had.
 we turned onto the exit ramp into le grand. when we stopped at the bottom of the ramp we didn't see any other lights, but did see all of the stars including the little dipper. and at least two sets of blinking lights that appeared to be airplane lights. one a little lower then the three bright lights traveling from south to north. the second plane was at a higher altitude traveling from south east to northwest.
 my wife was scared and worried about this and i was a little upset because we had never seen anything like this before.
content.summary: Three lights looked like stars then went straigh up and faded away.

content.detailedDescription: It was flying south when i first saw it then without turning headed north for aprox. 1 minute then headed south at a high rate of speed. to me looked like it was over the ocean aprox 5 miles away. it did not flashthe red glow was bright and constent with a small tale like a comet.It was 9:17 pm and event lasted about 4.5 minutes
content.summary: It was flying south when i first saw it then without turning headed north for aprox. 1 minute then headed south at a high rate of speed. to me looked like it was over the ocean aprox 5 miles away. it did not flashthe red glow was bright and constent with

content.detailedDescription:
i was driving to,work for,a,3rd shift factory job in london, oh. it was about  10pm. i saw what looked,like an airplane  at first. then the bottom  and front,lights changed. i watched it tobthe best of my ability while,drivin. i saw,ut go,in a straightish path. i looked back  at the road then back at thr diretion where it was and it had landed,in a harvested field.  i did not  see it land, just saw it illuminating itself with the colorful,lights on the bottom, showong it's dark,dome disk shape. the colorful lights were only on for a few,seconds. i looked,away then looked,back it and went back to white lights. it,then,went dark then noticed,a,bright white light that was,on one side of the street, then went to the other. so,it must have crossed the steet. i,kept on driving  and tried to keep,track,of the white light, but lost,it. i tried to look,for it again while,in my car when i parked at work, but didn't,find,it. i work 3rd,shift at a factory. 

  i had a clear look at it, when it was on the ground with the colorful lights, but i did not,get a picture of it, as i did not even think about,it at the time, due to shock and a strange,feeling that came all around me after my,heart skipped,a,beat.  when i did think abt getting a picture, i looked behind me,and there was a car coming in the distance, so i decided not to,get it. i should have stopped my car, put,my hazzards on got to the side of the,road reversed and got it picture, but like  i said the colorful lights  only lasted a few seconds. i wonder if the person in the car behind me saw it.
content.summary: Looked like,an airplane at first. then front and bottom lights changed.It went i  a straightish path, then landed. i did not  see it land. the,white lights  turned to,color  lights,showing  the circlar shape to it.

content.detailedDescription:
Was in my living room and i walked into next room to look out window. i live directly across from a middle school. the highway is parallel to my apartment building and runs east to west. to the east of my apartment is the newark airport. so it's not uncommon to see planes flying low to land at airport. when i went to the window i saw above the tree line and the school flying west to east 60+ unidentifiable objects. some in formation and some not but all moving silently east. not changing altitude. i went into other room to get my phone to tape the event, when i returned i only saw what was in video. at the time of the video i was distraught and not thinking straight so that's way i say i saw 20-30. it was at lest 60. when i put the phone down i grabbed binoculars and got a look at the last one. i saw a red triangle glowing with an orange under glow to it. the last one then speed up and moved in a diagonal direction and disappeared. it was a clear night no wind, although only minutes after seeing them i could not see them as far as i could see to the east. they just vanished.
          my fist thought at the time was asian sky lanterns. then maybe jets, government drones,or fireworks. but i know what they all look like and they did not fit any of those disruptions. 
          also my phone wi fi was going in and out, normally this doesn't happen. 
          thank you for reading this.
content.summary: Saw multiple lights flying over school across the street, approximately 60 +

content.detailedDescription: Bright light in the area of pierre elliott trudeau international airport
content.summary: Bright light in the area of pierre elliott trudeau international airport

content.detailedDescription:
My husband came in the house from going to get something from the truck and yelled for me to go out on upstairs balcony which faces north. it was exactly
7:30pm. no cloud cover or fog, to the immediate sw(not quite over ocean)i saw a huge glowing blue egg shaped thing with a haze of white that seemed to emanate from it. 
it was gigantic. bigger than the moon. it's light made stars almost invisible with its light. i watched it for about 5 minutes, went back inside to get my phone and took about 16 pictures of it.
sat out there until i got bored with it maybe 30 minutes when i next stepped out it was gone and starlight had returned.
my reactions was one of awe, it was gorgeous, the color and gigantic.
we live in the hillside and have only one neighbor who is two football fields away, but we had a water truck up here filling our cistern and the two guys doing that saw it as well.
i have zero speculation of what is was. it definitely wasn't normal.
i must say i have never believed in aliens, ufo's etc., until moving here. over the years, past ten, we have seen some really bizarre stuff in the night sky.
the strangest thing is not only did the photos i know i took not show up on my lgg3 phone but all of my photos not on sd card were gone. remain gone. about 130 important pictures were somehow deleted but obnly from phones internal memory not sd card.
i am interested if anyone knows what it was.
content.summary: Stationary blu egg shaped object not moving

content.detailedDescription:
In the early hours of a september day in 1999  around 05.30 (dark) i was driving on the a361 in a s/w direction towards devizes,returning to my works depot after night time deliveries in the local area.When i noticed a orange discus shaped object hovering,about 20ft of the ground, below the horizon about 400ft away from me in  front of the road i was travelling on.
my first thoughts were "that's not right" or "that shouldn't be there" as i'm very familiar with surrounding area.The object was a solid vivid orange,like a discus cut in half with a very small round light of the same colour next to it a fraction of the size of main object. it was a very vivid orange but it did not appear to illuminate the surrounding area which i thought was odd.
and the whole time i was travelling straight towards this object at speed of 50-60 mph.
i remember thinking at the time as i was rushing towards it the small light could be a street light but there's never been any street lights there and what is the other object?

that's my last memory of approaching the objects, the next thing i remember is the road rushing underneath me in my van and i pull into a lay-by on the outskirts of west ashton, 12 miles the other side of the event!.It was then daylight and over 1 hour has passed. why i pulled over was unusual as i was so close to getting back to work only 10 miles away, i normally would not have bothered. but i got out and whilst smoking a cigarette and looking at the sky (now daytime)in a n/ne direction i noticed a orange flash to my right in amongst the layers of cumulus clouds which only lit up some of the cloud. this was then followed by two flashes on my left in different cumulus clouds.
i finished my cigarette, smiled to myself (which anybody who knows me would say that's out of character and i found it odd myself) and drove back to work and then home only ever telling my wife what happened.

fourteen years went by and i never gave it a second thought,but over the past two years it's really played on my mind, in my waking/daily/sleeping thoughts.
that's my story i know it sounds mad but i know what i saw and experienced and it's doing my head in!
content.summary: Driving towards orange discus shaped object below the horizon & above the road.Then loss of place and time.

content.detailedDescription:
While walking my dogs with my son on my property, i observed about a dozen very small circular shaped objects moving from north to south (objects were probably 75 degrees upward from the horizon and toward the east).  i watch them for about a minute, until they moved behind a cloud.  took several pictures with my blackberry phone, but when looking at them on the computer, the objects didn't show up, even when i enlarged them greatly and under different filters (probable just too small to show up on a phone camera).

while watching them, some of them did seen to reflect the sunlight.  at first site, they were in a "v" formation and slowly moved into a "u" formation just prior to moving behind a cloud where upon i lost site of them.

it's hard to estimate the size, since they were so high in the sky, but they were above the cloud cover that they went behind when i lost site of them.
content.summary: Multiple small disc shape in 'v" formation than moved to a "u" formation

content.detailedDescription: Noticed interesting cloud formation one day,so took several pictures with cell phone.Saw that the moon was in one so i blew it up and an object started coming into view. the bigger it got,the more it looked like a classic flying saucer. hope you can tell me what you think it is! sorry ,all have is the still.
content.summary: Took picture from back yard..Noticed object later when i blew it up.

content.detailedDescription:
Driving to work around 8:15am on the second thursday in june, 2014.
took shortcut through lindsley heights condo complex in north caldwell, nj. proceeded up steep main driveway of complex and caught sight of object hovering approx. 15-30 feet over treetops. object resembled two walnuts - an upper and lower - joined by a vertical "slat." object was dark brown or black, displayed a slight horizontal highlight across its midline, possible had a segmented texture, no visible propulsion, no noise, no additional objects entering or leaving, no lights, no other known witnesses, no apparent interaction with environment. object was first viewed while driving south. as object floated very slowly (not sure if it ascended; if so, did this quite gradually), toward southwest, i lost sight due to trees. i drove west along side street to "catch up" with object, and caught a glimpse as it slowly entered low-lying fog.
object did not appear to be drone. object did not appear to be solar balloon (homemade or purchased) due to its shape. in any case, the foggy morning precluded sufficient sunlight from warming such a device. when first sighted, the larger walnut sat beneath a smaller version. after recapturing the object during the second sighting, the config. changed: both spheres adopted a more horizontal position. at maximum height, object approached about 300 feet. the smaller walnut was either truly smaller, or simply farther away from me (perspective effect), so this confounded an accurate size estimate. all in all, the object resembled a musical note with a smaller sphere at the top, instead of the familiar "flag." it did not demonstrate the rapid ascent or wind-blown course of a
fully inflated balloon (like a child's science project). the object appeared to move deliberately and without regard to witnesses. i have searched a variety of ufo shapes on the internet. this object did not fall into any of those categories.

thank you
content.summary: 2 "walnuts" connected by vertical slat. silent, dark surface, hover to slow move into fog.

content.detailedDescription: My daughter is 13 years old and she was taking the dogs out like she normally does at 7pm and she likes to look up at the stars. this time she screamed when she saw an egg with lights in the sky. she called for me and my husband and by the time we got out there it was gone. she showed us up in the sky what it had done and there was no sound nor was there any exhaust from a plane. the direction she was pointing went over lake erie. she then came in the house and the dogs wanted to get back out side.
content.summary: Daughter said she saw lights and an egg in the sky

content.detailedDescription: As i was working at my shop,out side by the pool. i noticed a cylender shape object in the sky going es direction. no visable wings or tail. the sun was shineing on the object,was rose color on rear section. there was a pic of the same as i saw that a lady posted on your web site in denton tx.
content.summary: Cylender shape, rings around aft section. as pic of the one in denton tx.

content.detailedDescription: I was outside on our reservation.There are no lights in the area, neither  house or street or cars. i was taking pictures as the sun dropped below the mountain. just as it dropped to complete blackness i saw to the left a tiny white cloud like whiteness with  2 flashing lights.. one on the left was bright white and the one on the right connected was bright red..Then it was like  a flash of white and to the right a little distance it turned into this perfect circle of white ness.. i mean a perfect circle.. and it kept getting bigger and bigger .. as it did to the right of the circle.. sorta sideways was a pulsing  and vibrating opening in the sky... suddenly inside the top arc of the circle became this left to right beautiful turquoise vapor or cloud. i tried filming but all i could get was the white opening.... after it started to fade away suddenly 2 basketball size circles.. appeared moving east to west across the groundright in front of me ....The 2 circles really scared me cause they were 3 feet in front of my feet.. my first thought was it must be the military circling overhead cause they saw it too... but as i looked up above me there was nothing ..I was a bit shaken and slammed my door shut. when i got back to the city, everyone else was talking about some other kind of sighting.. noone had talked about the same visual i  had.. i called another tribal member and asked did they notice they sky and they said they were inside but the dog was running back and forth in the house barking.
content.summary: Bright lights to the left, burst of perfect circle and then pulsating opening in the sky

content.detailedDescription: 3 pm i was looking out the window i noticed something flying toward the neighbors house , the spherical object  landed on the smokestack and remained there for 1 minute and suddenly disappeared
content.summary: Das

content.detailedDescription: Tonight while driving with my girl friend we saw a strange extremely bright light just hovering off in the distance of the sky. it almost looked as if it was a planet at first, but it was just to close and bright. as we drove closer to this object in the sky we found it was slowly moving hovering above. so slowly that we did not notice it's movements until we had gotten much closer. it did not have any blinking lights whatsoever as it flew over my girlfriend told me she has to grab her phone and take a picture right away, we opened my sun roof and she snapped a few photos. i for one am completely open to anyone's personal thoughts of this regarding the authenticity. i can promise we have not done anything to modify the image these are zoomed in shots taken on an iphone5 at night. please let me know what you think and if you have info on this, i believe i may have caught something here i've never seen anything like it.
content.summary: Hovering light in the sky then appeared to slowly move across the sky.

content.detailedDescription: My girlfriend asked me to dump the mop water outside for her i opened the front door went to step out and a light caught my eye to the southeast of us. i yelled for her to come here and i pointed it out to her. the lights where bright yellow orange and green they floated up from the 1st spot stopped hoovered for 10 to 15 seconds then moved about 10 degrees to the right after that my neighbors daughter walked out of her house and asked what we was looking at i told her i don't know and she walked the 102 feet to my house and it started to move away to the southeast till we couldn't see it for the trees. it had just stormed about 30 min before this happened it was below the clouds still light out there was wind blowing to the east but seemed to have no effect on the object could see the clouds moving fast over it. it seemed to be a long distance away and 500 to a 1000 feet off the ground. also my parents live about 9 mile south of me and 2 days before this happened they seen a object with the same lights but the orange light was flashing when they seen it and it was left to right then up and down then made a circle it was to the northeast of them. would have to ask them for more details about what they seen
content.summary: My girlfriend and i both watched it. it had 3 bright lights that seemed to be connected and brightest lights ive ever seen in the day time.

content.detailedDescription: My girlfriend and i were at a local township park observing the super moon. it was a very clear night with low humidity. we were laying on a blanket stargazing. i looked up and saw what i thought was a satellite due to the speed it was moving. we tracked it across the sky both looking at it move when it suddenly stopped. we both asked each other if we saw that.  we discussed it and watched it hover way in the atmosphere for over an hour. at first i swore it was a satellite and thought it was cool to see something moving that fast. but when it abruptly stopped,and continued to emit light i knew it was not at all a satellite. and then observing it "hovering" for over and hour, we knew this was something out of the ordinary. there is now a closed air base in the area, so i grew up seeing military aircraft in the skies. i have seen shooting stars, comets, aurora and other satellites, but this was way out of the parameters of anything i have seen before.
content.summary: Moved w/high velocity thru the atmosphere. then stopped hard. and hovered.

content.detailedDescription: I woke up around 6 am this morning an went to the window to look out at the weather before i made my mind up to go out fishing,as i was looking up at the trees and the clouds i saw a reflection in the morning sky as if the sun had hit a piece of shiny metal,so i paid closer attention to it i notice it was moving faster than any plane i saw and it wouldn't be a shooting star in the day rite? and in seconds it was gone before i could tell what exactly i was looking at i am still looking for answers.
content.summary: Saw a object flying across the sky moving faster than anything i ever saw/ i saw the sun reflect from it an in seconds it was gone

content.detailedDescription: On 11/9/2015 at approx. 505 am i was on front porch in golden co. having morning cigarette and looked sw at the southern cross and saw a pulsating light at extreme altitude thought it had to be military jet the light was different then i have ever seen on jets.. watched for 10 plus seconds it then took a abrubt 90 degree turn to the south for 5 degrees and was gone no possible way our technology. the way it went out of sight is like it left earths orbit and at a unbelievable speed
content.summary: Pulsating light at great distance

content.detailedDescription: I was laying on my pool deck after working in the yard all day and staring at the clouds, there were not many clouds and a few low laying thin clouds from the top right of my field of vision i spotted what i thought was a plane/ jet moving at a fairly high rate of speed so i started tracking it as the rest of the sky was empty reflections of the sun showed vessel to be high metallic silver which was pretty to look at. any ways tracking for close to 30 seconds she went behind a small thin cloud and should have reappeared within 3-4 seconds but never did which struck me very odd because a plane traveling at that rate of speed and such a thin low laying cloud could not have provided enough cover for a plane to change direction. i have not told anybody about what i saw due to criticism but heard about this sight due to the missle launch event in california which mentioned this sight. i am a male 35 years of age with no medical conditions or drug useage work for the govt so maintain rational thought. this however has stuck with me and kept my head in the clouds for a few weeks now
content.summary: Into thin air

content.detailedDescription: I summed it up on the brief description, it was not a plane or shooting star, it was leaving away from the earth i have seen similar objects before in the same location, i have seen the change trajectory also
content.summary: Star like moving fast, i watched it for about 3 minutes as it left the atmosphere, no flashing lights just bright and solid, i watched it until it finally got so small i couldnt see it any more, the trajectory was 80 to 85 degrees leaving atmosphere

content.detailedDescription: I saw the object around 4am when i was walking out onto my back patio to get some fresh air. while i was standing there i looked up into the sky to look at the stars when i noticed a strange slowly pulsating semi solid white light in the south east towards retreat. i then proceeded to watch this object hover in place for about 3 minuets before the object seemed to fade into the night sky. my first though was that it was a plane until i noticed the light weren't blinking blue, that it was a slightly pulsating white color, then i thought it might be a satellite but the sky was cloudy so it couldn't have been one.
content.summary: The object was just hovering in the distance and seemed to fade out in the distance.

content.detailedDescription: I went back to bed from my rest room when i looked up at the sky enjoying the brilliant view to the stars. my bed stood right next to the window. then i realised 3 objects flying over my house from east to west. first i thought it was a satellite. but three of them in triangular formation is impossible. they disappeared sometimes because of their dive into earths shadow sometimes. the first object was to the right. diagonally behind it on the left side was another one. the third one was behind the first one on the right side. suddenly the third one made a turn behind the second one on the left side and then behind the first on on the right side. that was so fast that i was awake in an instance. objects flying in an altitude of satellites making such quick and smoothe direction changes are not normal, i thought! they flew with the speed of a satellite further west till they disappeared a bit further.
content.summary: 3 objects in triangular formation

content.detailedDescription: We were just north of shasta county. saw 7 enamolies along with 3 others. they flew strait up, and down, then threw each other. had shadows. like they flew threw each other. never saw anything like that before. we had been asked to come watch this, had been going on for a week. didnt believe it till we saw it
content.summary: They flew into each other and shot out another one. there were at least 7

content.detailedDescription: So i was with this girl and i was gonna take her home for rice and pilaf. and then i was like maybe i'll go to a bar and take girl to a bar. so i got in my car with my girl and we drove to the bar but on the way i passed by the train station and i sara it. i looked up and i saw it. i don't know what this looks like. none of the descriptive options on this site suited what i saw. i feel disoriented now an i feel like i need to say this over the phone... they may be able to see what i'm typing here and i don't want to say too much. please call me and i'll tell you everything about them.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Unknown
content.summary: I was there. they know.
